sentences.en: A one - time decision of this kind consumes few judicial resources.
sentences.cn: 这种依靠以在裁定的方法花费极少的司法经费.

sentences.en: Administrative practice generally follows the judicial model in allocating burdens of proof.
sentences.cn: 在分配举证责任方面,行政实践通常遵循司法模式.

sentences.en: Bias against women permeates every level of the judicial system.
sentences.cn: 各级司法机构普遍存在对女性的偏见。

sentences.en: For judicial purposes, it matters not which of those things occurred.
sentences.cn: 为了司法上的目的, 无论发生什么都无关紧要.

sentences.en: He is a man with a judicial mind.
Inherent in judicial review are many functional limitations.
sentences.cn: 司法审查本身带有许多固有的职能限制.

sentences.en: One restriction on agency action takes the form of judicial review.
sentences.cn: 对机构行为实行限制的另外一种形式表现为司法复审.

sentences.en: Some of the residents sought judicial review of that refusal.
sentences.cn: 一些居民对这种拒绝寻求司法复审.

sentences.en: The judicial response to the program was mixed.
sentences.cn: 司法界对此项目的反应褒贬不一.

sentences.en: The last judicial hanging in Britain was in l964.
sentences.cn: 英国最后一例绞刑判决是在1964年。

sentences.en: The process of judicial selection was held up to ridicule.
sentences.cn: 司法选举的过程成为了笑柄。

sentences.en: The report accuses the judicial system of inconsistency and partiality.
sentences.cn: 报告指责司法系统执法前后不一且有失公正。

sentences.en: The Supreme Court has also called for judicial restraint in this area.
sentences.cn: 最高法院在这一领域也要求司法抑制.

sentences.en: Their development still leaves scope for judicial ingenuity and boldness.
sentences.cn: 它们的发展状况仍然给司法上的大胆探索和创造留有余地.

sentences.en: Thus, agencies may face intensive judicial scrutiny of their factual determinations.
sentences.cn: 这样, 机构就会面临对他们的事实性裁决做详尽的司法检查.

words.tran_cn: 应受审判的；可被审判的
意见；判断力；[法] 审判；评价
公正的，明断的；[法]法庭的；审判上的

phrases.tran_cn: 最高上诉法院；最高法院

trans.tran_cn: 司法的，法庭的，明断的，公正的
trans.tran_en: Judicial means relating to the legal system and to judgments made in a court of law
